title: Sell El Tesoro Tequila
metaTitle: Sell El Tesoro Tequila | Paradiso, 70th, 75th | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your El Tesoro de Don Felipe. We buy Paradiso, Aniversario releases (70th, 75th, 80th), and 'White Label' vintage bottles. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy El Tesoro Paradiso and Aniversario bottles.
introParagraph: El Tesoro de Don Felipe is a benchmark for traditional tequila. We purchase the acclaimed Paradiso Extra A単ejo, created in partnership with Alain Royer of A. de Fussigny Cognac. We also buy the limited Aniversario bottlings (70th, 75th, 80th) and vintage 'White Label' bottles from the 1990s.
whatWeBuy: El Tesoro Paradiso (older 'A' bottles and box)
El Tesoro Mundial Collection (Laphroaig finish, etc.)
Vintage 'White Label' El Tesoro (Blanco, Reposado, A単ejo)
pricingFactors: Paradiso batch (older batches are more valuable)
Bottle style (Olive oil shape vs current round)

faqs.question: Is Paradiso valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, especially the older bottlings designated as Class A.

faqs.question: What is the 70th Aniversario?
faqs.answer: The 70th Aniversario is a legendary Extra A単ejo aged for 7 years. It is highly collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 'White Label' bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, the old paper label bottles (often called 'White Label') from the 90s are very desirable to collectors.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Laphroaig finish?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Mundial collection, including the Laphroaig finish, is something we purchase.

faqs.question: Do you buy standard El Tesoro?
faqs.answer: Typically only if it is an older bottling. Current store-shelf bottles are not bought individually.

faqs.question: How do I sell my collection?
faqs.answer: Submit a list of your bottles via our secure form for a quick quote.
